trans-unit.source: Autoplay Interval in Milliseconds
Sets the interval for the automatic tab-switching in milliseconds (e.g. entering the value 7000 switches the tabs every 7 seconds). Is ignored if Autoplay is disabled.
Pages and Content That Shall be Rendered as Tabs
If the selection is not empty, "Combined" mode is forced.
Enable Autoplay

When Autoplay is enabled, the page will automatically switch between the tabs from left to right in the interval specified below. When the last tab is reached, the animation starts over with the first tab. Available for the Website-Base as an additional feature. More information at www.sgalinski.de/typo3-produkte-webentwicklung/die-website-base/
Enable MouseOver Navigation

If not enabled, users need to click on a tab to open it. If enabled, the tabs will switch when the user hovers over them. Available for the Website-Base as an additional feature. More information at www.sgalinski.de/typo3-produkte-webentwicklung/die-website-base/
Hash

Name that is used to implement history and direct linking functionality. Available for the Website-Base as an additional feature. More information at www.sgalinski.de/typo3-produkte-webentwicklung/die-website-base/
Mode
Combined (Show elements chosen below, one tab each)
Show every subpage of this page one tab each
Show every content element of the current page as one tab each
Override Tab Titles

Separation of the tab headings by line break, i.e. one title per line must be entered. If a title is not to be overwritten, simply insert a blank line or the keyword "DEFAULT". In order to override other titles, the first tab's title has to be overridden because empty lines at the beginning are ignored.
More
Didn't found any content for rendering of the tabs. Please check your plugin configuration.
Show pages or content elements like tabs.
